performance_metrics.name: Bread Volume (per Batch)
performance_metrics.description: Total volume of finished bread produced in a single batch. Measured in cubic meters (m³). Target is 2000 kg for a medium-sized commercial bakery.

performance_metrics.name: Yield Rate (kg/hour)
performance_metrics.description: Total weight of bread produced per hour. This metric considers both production rate and loaf size.  A higher rate indicates greater production efficiency.

performance_metrics.name: Loaf Count per Hour
performance_metrics.description: Number of standard loafs (e.g., 750g) produced per hour. Dependent on batch size and baking cycle.

performance_metrics.name: Crumb Volume (cm³/g)
performance_metrics.description: A measure of bread texture and quality. Measured using a crumb analysis test.  Target is 500 cm³/750g loaf.

performance_metrics.name: Moisture Content (%)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of water in the final bread product.  Crucial for shelf life and texture. Should be maintained within a specified range for optimal results.

performance_metrics.name: Crust Hardness (Shore A)
performance_metrics.description: A measure of crust resistance.  Assessed using a Shore A durometer.  Higher values indicate a harder, crisper crust.

implementation_requirements.name: Dough Mixer
implementation_requirements.specifications: Stainless Steel, Planetary Mixer, 150 - 300 liters capacity, Variable Speed Control (0-1000 RPM), Dough Temperature Control (+/- 5°C)
implementation_requirements.description: Essential for thorough dough development.  Planetary mixers are preferred for consistent mixing.

implementation_requirements.name: Proofer
implementation_requirements.specifications: Temperature Range: 25 - 35°C, Humidity Range: 70 - 80%, Air Circulation System, Digital Temperature & Humidity Control
implementation_requirements.description: Controlled environment for dough fermentation. Precise temperature and humidity are critical for yeast activity.

implementation_requirements.name: Baking Oven
implementation_requirements.specifications: Convection Oven, Temperature Range: 250 - 300°C, Uniform Temperature Distribution (+/- 3°C), Digital Temperature Control, Dough Conveyor System
implementation_requirements.description: Convection ovens provide even baking. Dough conveyor ensures consistent loaf positioning.

implementation_requirements.name: Sheather/De-Palmer
implementation_requirements.specifications: Automated, Stainless Steel, Loaf Size Adjustment (750g - 1000g)
implementation_requirements.description: Automated cutting and shaping of loaves after baking.

implementation_requirements.name: Cooling Conveyor
implementation_requirements.specifications: Stainless Steel, Temperature Range: 10 - 25°C, Conveyor Speed: 20-30 m/hour
implementation_requirements.description: Controlled cooling to prevent over-drying and maintain optimal texture.

implementation_requirements.name: Ingredient Storage
implementation_requirements.specifications: Temperature Controlled, Humidity Controlled, FIFO (First-In, First-Out) System
implementation_requirements.description: Proper storage conditions are essential to maintain ingredient quality and shelf life.  Temperature range: 15-25°C
